## IssuerResolver class

IssuerResolver is a class that allows to interact with the issuer's http endpoint to get revocation status.

 IssuerResolver

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class IssuerResolver implements CredentialStatusResolver 
```
**Implements:** [CredentialStatusResolver](./js-sdk.credentialstatusresolver.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [resolve(credentialStatus)](./js-sdk.issuerresolver.resolve.md) |  | resolve is a method to resolve a credential status directly from the issuer. |
